chapter.title: RESTEasy WADL Support
chapter.para: RESTEasy has its own support to generate WADL for its resources, and it supports several different containers. The following text will show you how to use this feature in different containers.

section.para: RESTEasy WADL support for Netty Container is simliar to the support for JDK HTTP Server. It also uses ResteasyWadlDefaultResource to serve '/application.xml' and ResteasyWadlGenerator to generate WADL info for resources. Here is the sample code:
